languages.text: "Отче, ты носишь в себе семя порока. Покайся, прежде, чем оно прорастет".

traits.locale_text: "Отче, ты носишь в себе семя порока. Покайся, прежде, чем оно прорастет".

languages.text: "Reverend, you carry the seed of vice within you. Repent before it sprouts."
languages.original_text: "Отче, ты носишь в себе семя порока. Покайся, прежде, чем оно прорастет".

traits.locale_text: "Father, you carry the seed of vice within you. Repent before it sprouts."
"Father, you carry the seed of vice within you. Repent before it sprouts."
"Father, you carry the seed of vice within you. Repent before it sprouts."
"Father, you carry the seed of vice within you. Repent before it sprouts."
"Reverend, you carry the seed of vice within you. Repent before it sprouts."
"Reverend, you carry the seed of vice within you. Repent before it sprouts."

languages.text: “牧师，你的体内藏着罪恶的种子。在它萌芽之前，赶紧忏悔吧。”
languages.original_text: "Reverend, you carry the seed of vice within you. Repent before it sprouts."

traits.locale_text: “神父，你的体内藏着罪恶的种子。在它萌芽之前，赶紧忏悔吧。”

languages.text: 「司祭よ、お前は悪の種を宿している。芽が出る前に悔い改めることだ」
languages.original_text: "Reverend, you carry the seed of vice within you. Repent before it sprouts."

traits.locale_text: 「司祭よ、お前は悪の種を宿している。芽が出る前に悔い改めることだ」

languages.text: «Reverendo, lleva la semilla del vicio dentro de usted. Arrepiéntase antes de que brote».
languages.original_text: "Reverend, you carry the seed of vice within you. Repent before it sprouts."

traits.locale_text: «Padre, lleva la semilla del vicio dentro de usted. Arrepiéntase antes de que brote».

languages.text: "Reverend, Ihr tragt die Saat des Lasters in Euch. Bereut, ehe sie sprießt."
languages.original_text: "Reverend, you carry the seed of vice within you. Repent before it sprouts."

traits.locale_text: "Vater, Ihr tragt die Saat des Lasters in Euch. Bereut, ehe sie sprießt."

languages.text: « Révérend, je sens en vous la graine du vice. Repentez-vous avant qu'elle ne germe. »
languages.original_text: "Reverend, you carry the seed of vice within you. Repent before it sprouts."

traits.locale_text: « Mon père, je sens en vous la graine du vice. Repentez-vous avant qu'elle ne germe. »

languages.text: "Muhterem, içinde kötülük tohumları barındırıyorsun. Bu tohumlar filizlenmeden önce tövbe et."
languages.original_text: "Reverend, you carry the seed of vice within you. Repent before it sprouts."

traits.locale_text: "Muhterem, içinde kötülük tohumları barındırıyorsun. Bu tohumlar filizlenmeden önce tövbe et."
